body_html:
This requires large changes/re-designs. I am not sure if we will get to it in the short term, so I'm marking as contributions welcome.

(Workaround for your issue, of course, is to use tf.zeros(). Although I suspect you don't just want to initialize with zeros?)
body_text:

(Workaround for your issue, of course, is to use tf.zeros().  Although I suspect you don't just want to initialize with zeros?)
body:
This requires large changes/re-designs.  I am not sure if we will get to it in the short term, so I'm marking as contributions welcome.

(Workaround for your issue, of course, is to use `tf.zeros()`.  Although I suspect you don't just want to initialize with zeros?)
